heading: passage: rose bird, 63
subheading: the first female head of the california supreme court, rose elizabeth bird, succumbed to a lengthy battle with breast cancer. a liberal, outspoken judge, bird was appointed by former governor jerry brown. conservative voters led her ouster 10 years later, over bird's opposition to the death penalty. bird battled cancer for more than 20 years, first with conventional surgeries then with megavitamins and a vegetarian diet. she died saturday at stanford university hospital.
author: wired staff
text: the first female head of the california supreme court, rose elizabeth bird, succumbed to a lengthy battle with breast cancer. a liberal, outspoken judge, bird was appointed by former governor jerry brown. conservative voters led her ouster 10 years later, over bird's opposition to the death penalty. bird battled cancer for more than 20 years, first with conventional surgeries then with megavitamins and a vegetarian diet. she died saturday at stanford university hospital.
